caseStudyPage.title: Powering Studio Doe's Digital Transformation.
caseStudyPage.challengeP1: As Taiwan's leading fashion brand, Studio Doe faced extreme traffic spikes during major sales. The traditional monolithic architecture could no longer support the brand's rapid growth, urgently requiring a highly available, scalable infrastructure that could deeply integrate future AI capabilities.
caseStudyPage.challengeP2: 'Stability' is just the baseline—'flexibility' and 'forward-thinking' are what determine long-term brand competitiveness.
caseStudyPage.solutionIntro: Vaxal helped Studio Doe rebuild from the architecture foundation, establishing complete CI/CD pipelines, microserviced components, and introducing a Ryko-based AI lab environment.
caseStudyPage.solutionVisual: High-Resolution Visual: Infrastructure Map with Real-time Traffic Visualization
caseStudyPage.impactP1: Now, Studio Doe no longer needs to worry about system crashes during promotions. The brand team can focus on creativity and marketing, while Vaxal provides the most solid technical backing.
caseStudyPage.impactP2: This system has also laid the perfect data and interface foundation for future AI-powered size recommendations and intelligent restocking systems.

rykoPage.title: The Operating System for Enterprise Intelligence.
rykoPage.subtitle: Ryko isn't just an AI model container—it's the core runtime connecting enterprise data with LLMs. Supporting MCP protocols, skill mounting, and multi-modal interaction, letting AI understand your business language.
rykoPage.assertionText: Most AI applications are still stuck at the chatbot stage, unable to touch core enterprise data. Ryko breaks down this wall. It's a standardized runtime that lets LLMs safely read and write enterprise APIs through tools, transforming AI from 'consultant' to 'team member'.
rykoPage.capabilitiesSubtitle: Three pillars of enterprise-grade AI runtime
rykoPage.cap1Desc: Full support for Model Context Protocol (MCP). Write your internal tools once, and any Ryko-powered model can invoke them. Standardized interfaces for precise enterprise resource orchestration.
rykoPage.cap1Visual: Animation: Ryko dispatching tasks to various MCP Servers
rykoPage.cap2Desc: Not locked to any single model. Ryko lets you freely switch between GPT-4, Claude 3, or Llama 3. Choose the most suitable model based on task difficulty, balancing cost and performance.
rykoPage.cap2Visual: Visual: Switching models (OpenAI → Anthropic → Local Llama) seamlessly
rykoPage.cap3Desc: For sensitive data, Ryko supports fully air-gapped deployment. Combined with local models, ensuring data stays within your data center in a closed loop, meeting the strictest security standards.
rykoPage.cap3Visual: Visual: Shield icon protecting a server rack, data staying inside

brevflowPage.title: Workflow Automation, Reimagined for Agents.
brevflowPage.subtitle: BrevFlow is a workflow platform built for the AI era. Here, nodes aren't just rigid API triggers—they're Ryko Agents with decision-making capabilities. It's like assigning tasks to a team of digital colleagues, not writing a script.
brevflowPage.assertionText: Traditional automation (Zapier/n8n) is powerful but can't handle ambiguous decisions. BrevFlow introduces 'Agent Nodes'. When a workflow reaches a decision point, hand it to AI for judgment, then continue execution. This prevents automation from breaking due to edge cases.
brevflowPage.cap1Desc: Embed Ryko Agents directly in your workflows. You can define a node's role (e.g., 'Senior Editor') and give it context. It processes input data like a real person, producing high-quality results.
brevflowPage.cap1Visual: Visual: A flow chart where one node is a glowing brain/avatar
brevflowPage.cap2Desc: Chain multiple Agents into a collaborative network. 'Researcher Agent' gathers data, passes it to 'Analyst Agent' for report writing, then 'Reviewer Agent' checks it. BrevFlow manages all message passing and state synchronization.
brevflowPage.cap2Visual: Visual: Multiple agents passing documents to each other in a sequence
brevflowPage.cap3Desc: Keep control. Set up human review checkpoints at critical nodes. When AI confidence is low or high-risk operations are involved, BrevFlow automatically pauses and notifies administrators to intervene, ensuring safety.
brevflowPage.cap3Visual: Visual: A flow pausing at a lock icon, waiting for user approval

formaldocPage.title:
Enterprise Standards,
Codified by AI.
formaldocPage.subtitle: FormalDoc is a document template construction system. Upload your enterprise standard Docx files, and we transform them into rigorous templates that AI can read and write. We even generate MCP Servers so all AI output meets the highest standards.
formaldocPage.assertionText: Enterprises suffer from chaotic document formats. FormalDoc doesn't just generate text—it locks down 'structure'. Through reverse engineering your existing documents, we extract implicit formatting rules and logic, packaging them into AI tools. Every output is a perfect 100.
formaldocPage.cap1Desc: Upload templates for instant parsing. Whether procurement contracts, technical whitepapers, or quarterly reports, FormalDoc deeply analyzes styles, variables, and paragraph structures. You can also download directly from our standard template library.
formaldocPage.cap1Visual: Visual: Docx file being scanned and broken down into structure blocks
formaldocPage.cap2Desc: Transform templates into tools. FormalDoc automatically generates corresponding MCP Server code. This means you can directly command Ryko: 'Generate a draft using the Procurement Contract Template'—no format tweaking needed.
formaldocPage.cap2Visual: Visual: Template block transforming into a code block/API icon
formaldocPage.cap3Desc: Human-AI collaborative refinement. Generated templates aren't rigid—you can adjust definitions collaboratively with AI on the FormalDoc platform. Ensure every field and clause precisely meets current business needs.
formaldocPage.cap3Visual: Visual: Users and AI cursor editing a document together

soloistboardPage.title:
Project Management
that Drives Itself.
soloistboardPage.subtitle: SoloistBoard is Trello for the AI era. Here, different Ryko Agents play PM, spec writers, and engineers. They're not just avatars on cards—they're productivity engines actively driving progress.
soloistboardPage.assertionText: Project software shouldn't just be a rigid tool for recording status. SoloistBoard brings kanban boards to life. When you create a requirement card, the 'Spec' Agent proactively asks for details; the 'Dev' Agent starts writing code. We turn project development into a symphony between AI and humans.
soloistboardPage.cap1Desc: Purpose-built agents. Configure different Agent roles for your project: Product Owner Agent clarifies requirement boundaries, Tech Lead Agent handles architecture review. They have their own identities and responsibilities on the board.
soloistboardPage.cap1Visual: Visual: Kanban board columns with Agent avatars on top
soloistboardPage.cap2Desc: Say goodbye to passive waiting. SoloistBoard's Agents actively check card stagnation time, send reminders, even auto-generate meeting summaries or daily reports. It ensures projects always maintain forward momentum.
soloistboardPage.cap2Visual: Visual: Notification popups from Agents nudging the progress
soloistboardPage.cap3Desc: All Agents share the same project context. Whether documents, conversation logs, or code changes, everything becomes the Agents' long-term memory. This dramatically reduces redundant communication between humans and AI.
soloistboardPage.cap3Visual: Visual: A central brain connecting to various project artifacts
